item.description:
Art on Newbury St!

Several galleries are having openings on Jan. 9, 5-7pm. We'll meet at the Arden and Chase Galleries (they're both at 129 Newbury), at 5:30, stay for half an hour or so, then wander. I'll send an update with a tentative itinerary closer to the date.

If you want to join us but can't make it at 5:30, let me know and I'll try to make it easy for you to find us.

See you there!
Cristin

Update 1/4:
Here is the itinerary with approximate times:
Arden and Chase , 129 Newbury, 5:30-6pm www.ardengallery.com; www.chasegallery.com
Gallery Naga, 67 Newbury, 6-6:20pm (NOTE: Naga is located inside the Church of the Covenant, but there is signage for the gallery outside). www.gallerynaga.com
ACME Fine Art and Robert Klein Gallery, 38 Newbury, 6:20-7pm www.acmefineart.com; www.robertkleingallery.com
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be carrying a pink messenger bag.
item.name: Newbury St. Gallery Openings
